search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for MaidCentral (maidcentral.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for MaidCentral is: [https://maidcentral.com/pricing/](https://maidcentral.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Start Growing Today with MaidCentral!
-------------------------------------

*   No Hidden Fees
*   Unlimited Users
*   Unlimited Customers
*   No Long-Term Contracts

Physical Locations:

Monthly Job Count:

Each physical location comes with its own unique challenges. Take the guesswork out of managing multiple branches.

With MaidCentral, we’re partners in growth so your success is our priority. Billing is based on the number of completed jobs\* you do per month.

#### Monthly Investment

$0

“MaidCentral is the ONLY software that checks all the boxes”
------------------------------------------------------------

It’s the only software that checks all the boxes we need, customer portal, online booking, email/text integration, tons of automations, customizable, lets us go paperless, has a field based component for technicians, it lets you see how efficient you are or are not, easy onboarding, incredible support and a very engaged community of users that value profitability, scalability and efficiency.

### Gary Murphy

#### Maid Brigade of White Plains

![Image 1: Gary Murphy of Maid Brigade shows off an award.](https://maidcentral.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Untitled-design-4.jpg)

![Image 2](blob:http://localhost/f2518b015390293cccf18938b61d191e)

“I Love MaidCentral!”
---------------------

First of all MaidCentral is extremely user friendly and offers exactly what we are looking for in a software. We love the scheduling, the reports, instant invoicing and credit card charging, great for employees in the field, they can clearly see the job notes, add pictures to the client’s profile. We can clearly see job cost, the average job cost if we send different people. AND my favorite part is price increase or price adjustment. Increasing prices, it used to take us weeks! Now it took us 30 min to increase 74 clients.

### Gosia Baran

#### Helping Hands Cleaning Services

FAQ’s
-----

### Why does your software cost so much?

We get asked this question all the time. MaidCentral is unlike any other cleaning business software on the market. It goes beyond just helping you to manage your day-to-day business. It’s designed to help you automate your business, boost revenue, and substantially elevate the trajectory of your business.

The truth is that technology should no longer be viewed as an expense. We’re living in a time of digital transformation where technology is literally changing how businesses operate. MaidCentral provides the technology and artificial intelligence that your company needs to make more money.

The better question to ask yourself is what is it costing to not have MaidCentral? By utilizing a less superior software, you’re wasting tons of time and money that will never get you to where you want to be in your business. The bottom line is that MaidCentral is the single greatest investment you can make in your business!

### Who owns my data?

You do! Any customer records (including credit cards) are 100% owned by you. MaidCentral does not have permission to use your customer info for any reason.

### Will my data be protected?

Yes, security is our top priority! We will always keep all your data protected and secure.

### Can you handle all my data?

Yes! Because MaidCentral is hosted on the largest public cloud cluster in the world (powered by Amazon and backed up by CloudFlare Security + CDN) we have virtually unlimited ability to scale in real time. Whether you have 500 jobs or 1,500 jobs, it won’t slow us down!

### Will I get to keep all my financial information?

You will get to keep all the rights to your financial information and other essential data.

### What data am I allowed to bring over?

You’re allowed to bring over future schedules, contact information, and house information. You cannot bring over past data, including previous customers.

### What integrations are required as part of onboarding?

You’ll need to upgrade to QuickBooks Online (QBO), Twilio, payment processor.

### Do I have to pay for updates?

No! We provide constant updates to our software, based upon our partner feedback and you get it all for FREE! Because MaidCentral is on the cloud, any new updates or features automatically show up in your  
account.

### What software have you already built import processes for?

We’ve already built import processes for several software products (Jobber, ZenMaid, HouseCall Pro, Customer Factor, Service CEO, Launch27, Service Autopilot, and MicroMaid Cloud).

### Do I need to sign a long-term contract?

No! We don’t have any long-term contracts. You’ll pay monthly and if you ever want to cancel, all we ask is for a 30-day cancellation notice.

### What happens if I need help with the software?

You will receive access to our expert customer support team, as well as to our private Facebook group where you can ask questions. Each week we offer LIVE training, as well as discuss future builds to the software.

Everything You Need To Grow & Scale
-----------------------------------

Your Cleaning Business!
-----------------------

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on the number of completed jobs per month, with no hidden fees and unlimited users and customers.
